verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: Have We not expanded your breast?
verse.verse_2: And removed from you, your burdon.
verse.verse_4: And We have exalted for you your remembrance.
verse.verse_5: Therefore, surely there is ease with hardship.
verse.verse_6: Undoubtedly, there is ease with hardship.
verse.verse_7: So when you are free after prayer, then strive hard in invocation.
verse.verse_8: And attend to your Lord only.
